Name: Save Aisha
About the game: Help Emran rescue his daughter (Aisha) who has been taken from his arms. You will join him in his journey through the castles and forests to meet the king. Heartfelt story at the beginning to the end of game. A beautiful world of animals, creatures and warriors. Traditional 2D animation that brings creatures and characters to life. Challenging gameplay that can be difficult but always fair. A collection of challenging traps, that the most skilled players can strive for. The game has a beautifully authentic style that bridges the gap between yesterday and today. Design, art, and audio hearken back to the days of 8-bit, The systems of today also give Save Aisha modern touches, detailed animation, multilayered parallax backgrounds, and novel game design. Full Controller Support. Multiple vibrant soundtracks by: Fabian - Of Far Different Nature, Juhani Junkala, Mega Pixel Music Lab, and Syncopika. Multiple awesome traps animated and drawn by SAINT11. Awesome enemy characters by Hugues Laborde, Openpixelproject, and Luiz Melo. heartfelt story Drawings By Amany Alshayeb. Amazing tilsets made by Luis Zuni, Openpixelproject, and CraftPix
